cells.data:
oc login -u developer -p developer
oc new-project apimanagement
oc new-app --file https://raw.githubusercontent.com/3scale/3scale-amp-openshift-templates/master/amp/amp.yml --param WILDCARD_DOMAIN=$(minishift ip).nip.io

Hint: Persistent volume creation could not work, https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_3scale/2.1/html/infrastructure/onpremises-installation#deployment_script_is_unable_to_create_persistent_storage_volumes => is actually removed, not valid anymore!
OpenShift templates at: https://github.com/3scale/3scale-amp-openshift-templates.git
